name: Angel of Judgment
description: The Angel of Judgment is a Huge celestial being embodying principles of balance, showcasing a majestic presence with celestial features and wielding a Greataxe.
memorable: Its dual aspect ability allows it to become a harbinger of either chaos or law, gaining advantages against specific enemies.
goals: To uphold the balance between law and chaos, confronting those who disrupt this balance.
relations: Might serve under higher celestial beings or frequently confront fiends and other chaotic entities.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or places where law and authority are in question.
strengths: High damage output with magical attacks and strong defensive capabilities including magic resistance and condition immunities.
weaknesses: Reliance on targeting specific creature types and vulnerabilities against certain adversaries.
attacks: Utilizes a powerful Greataxe attack that inflicts substantial slashing and force damage.
most_powerful_ability: Penance Gaze, allowing it to stun or restrain creatures based on their saving throws.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet and has an impressive passive Perception score of 23.
skills: Excels in History, Investigation, Perception, and Religion, each rated at +12 or +13.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage against spells.
Change Face ability allows it to adapt its alignment in battle.
Innate spellcasting centered around Charisma with a variety of utility spells.
Condition immunities to charmed, exhausted, and frightened.
Weapons of Balance ability deals extra force damage.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like Detect Evil and Good, Detect Magic, and Detect Thoughts at will, with powerful spells available once per day.
test_queries: huge celestial being with magical attacks
